thread.title: Blue Jackets beat Avalanche 4-3 for first win of season
thread.title_full: Blue Jackets beat Avalanche 4-3 for first win of season

title: Blue Jackets beat Avalanche 4-3 for first win of season
text: Add a message (optional) Success - Article sent! close Columbus Blue Jackets center Boone Jenner (38) celebrates a goal by teammate David Savard against Colorado Avalanche goalie Semyon Varlamov (1) during the first period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Denver. Associated Press Colorado Avalanche defenseman Nate Guenin (5) skates against Columbus Blue Jackets left wing Matt Calvert (11) during the first period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Denver. Associated Press Columbus Blue Jackets defenseman David Savard celebrates a goal against the Colorado Avalanche with teammates on the bench during the first period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Denver. Associated Press Colorado Avalanche left wing Cody McLeod (55) hits Columbus Blue Jackets right wing David Clarkson (23) during a fight in the first period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Denver. Associated Press Colorado Avalanche left wing Gabriel Landeskog moves the puck against the Columbus Blue Jackets during the second period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Denver. Associated Press Columbus Blue Jackets left wing Nick Foligno (71) tries unsuccessfully to wrap around the goal to score on Colorado Avalanche goalie Semyon Varlamov (1) and Nick Holden (2) during the second period of an NHL hockey game Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Denver. Associated Press
